docs.title: Welcome to Universal Arena
docs.text: This site outlines the structure and references for Universal Arena. Add your own content as you grow the guide.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This guide summarizes core systems and links to the detailed reference pages for terms, keywords, and characters.

docs.title: How To Play
docs.text:
1. Build a deck with characters and their cards.
  2. Play cards each turn by spending Energy; build Ultimate Meter to unleash ultimates.
  3. Track Keywords and Conditions to maximize your combos.

docs.title: Keywords
docs.text:
This page holds the full keyword reference. Use the filter to navigate large lists efficiently.

Forte

Max 2 Count. Primary resource for Forte-based abilities.

Spectro Frazzle

Max 10 Count. At the end of the opponent's turn, inflict damage equal to 5 * Count, then reduce Count by 1.

Stagnant Potency

Applies lingering damage that persists for several turns.

Combo

Grants bonus damage when triggered after another card of the same type this turn.

Break

Temporarily lowers an enemy's defenses, increasing damage taken.

Channel

Spend the current turn to prepare a stronger effect on the next round.
